channel.title: [Release]My first model! (Sword of Awe)[Release]
channel.description:
Alright, let's start with credits. This is the only time I will give Silent CJ credits for the tutorial as this is my first, 100% working model.
50% for Silent CJ's tutorial for modeling. 5% for Silent CJ's tutorial on the God Sword wielding animation. 2% for Silent CJ showing how to add ints. 30% for me for modeling the whole sword on my own, coloring it, and adding to the client. 10% for me for making the ints for you guys to use. 3% for the other stuff like pictures, uploading models, ect.
Please don't be harsh, as I have already stated that this is my first 100% working model. I modeled the sword on my own using Metaseq. Please be nice in the comments. Thank you.
Models: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?cw4yyzlymtm
Ints: (Comes with the download)
What to put in item.cfg ([u][b]NOT[/b][/u] item.java.) just scroll all the way to the bottom and add: [code]item = 15224 Sword_of_Awe The_Sword_of_Awe. 20000 20000 20000 -4 92 80 -4 0 0 0 0 0 -1 150 0[/code] Replace 150 at the end with the strength bonus you would like it to have.
Ladies and Gentalmen, the MOMENT YOU'VE ALL BEEN WAITING FOR!! INTRODUUUCCCIINNGGG!!
*pikchas* :)
In-Game [img]http://img44.imageshack.us/img44/9656/awe1.png[/img]
*proof I made it* [img]http://img55.imageshack.us/img55/4673/awe2.png[/img]
Oh, and PLEASE give me feed back, I want you to be kind, but not too kind, give me criticism people!! lol Tell me what you truly think of it :) (keep in mind I heard the word modeling for private servers about 2 days ago)

item.title: [Release]My first model! (Sword of Awe)[Release]
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:23, topic:299148”][quote author=runeite51 link=topic=395502.msg2942271#msg2942271 date=1251959917]
Lol, everyone owes someone something on this forum…
[/quote]

I owe 'Aaron sex.

Anyway, i know me and you got off to a pretty bad start, but i’m glad you’ve moved on from gravedigging and started yourself modelling.
Well, i can safely say this model is a fair bit better than some people’s first models, so, good job for that.

Now the criticism, the whole thing looks generally, skinny?
Handle needs to be more or a cylinder, and less like a squashed cucumber.
Colour choice, try to choose as realistic colours as possible, and if needed, use various shades of grey for the blade, for example.

But well done.[/quote]

Kk, i’ll switch up the colors and make it rounder

Read full topic

NICE WORK MAN! I can’t do sword :S Just working on a battleaxe atm, trying to get the textures PERFECT, going well hehe

Well seeminly we need the items for clients, what is the use of textures?
[/quote]

right, and 80% of the textures that your able to use with meta suck balls anyway.[/quote]
Acually if they are .jpeg put them into the textures folder and BAM, a new meta texture.

item.title: [Release]My first model! (Sword of Awe)[Release]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

runeite51:

Lol, everyone owes someone something on this forum…

I owe 'Aaron sex.

Anyway, i know me and you got off to a pretty bad start, but i’m glad you’ve moved on from gravedigging and started yourself modelling.
Well, i can safely say this model is a fair bit better than some people’s first models, so, good job for that.

Now the criticism, the whole thing looks generally, skinny?
Handle needs to be more or a cylinder, and less like a squashed cucumber.
Colour choice, try to choose as realistic colours as possible, and if needed, use various shades of grey for the blade, for example.

But well done.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release]My first model! (Sword of Awe)[Release]
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:21, topic:299148”][quote author=runeite51 link=topic=395502.msg2938935#msg2938935 date=1251740463]

Fine, ill hold back a little since its your first, but ill be more honest than ive been with most people.

OK it looks like shit, literally. i oculd probbably make a better model if i replaced my mouse and keyboard with shit covered paper with buttons drawn on. WTF is wrong with the blade? if oyu intended it to be all fucked,wavey, and glitchy, GJ cuz half of its smooth the other halfs jaged. the handle and hilt should NEVER be one material aswell as one mesh. its WAY too plain, and for once, plain isnt better ingame. whys he holding it towards the bottom? hes not playin baseball. that hilt and blade would snap even from blade vibration if it were real, make your models as realistic as possible. you gotta think “how would this be if made into a real weapon?”… I’ll stop there, cuz its your first model. dont call me an ass now, you asked me to give u honestly, even tho ive held back a bit.

did i mention now you cant call me an ass now?

Alright, now ill be encouraging
DONT take this as discouraging, dont think you should quit, just keep practicing and youll get better. Try primitive modelling, since your goin for simplicity anyways, prim modelling will do you better. I REPEAT, dont call me an asshole now.

OH YEA change the colors, i dont need to see a piss-shit colored sword.

ROFL?? why in the world would I quit modeling?? Call you an ass hole?? -you must be high or somethin- I was kinda hopin for more of you insults because they where more comedy than insults to me.
[/quote]

well he might just be high… i saw earlier where jjones owed dylan a blunt ;)[/quote]

Lol, everyone owes someone something on this forum…

Read full topic
